eventSummary:
A hacker accessed a bank's computer network, obtaining customer files that included names and Social Security numbers.
Sources:
- https://cryptopanic.com/news/25891206/Hacker-Hits-Banks-Computer-Network-Accesses-Customer-Files-Containing-Names-Social-Security-Numbers-and-More

The BNBCHAIN X account was compromised, with hackers posting phishing links. Users are advised not to click on any recent links from the account and to avoid connecting their wallets. Security teams are working to suspend the account and take down phishing websites.
Sources:
- https://t.me/BNBchaincommunity
- https://twitter.com/902926941413453824/status/1973244626531192968
